desc: "Personal Videoconferencing is having an enormous impact on business. Evan Rosen has quantified that impact with examples of real world implementations and provided a primer on how businesses can achieve this competitive advantage for themselves."  --Frank Gill, Executive Vice President, Internet and Communications Group, Intel    "The book is very good: it is clear and the examples of user applications are excellent"  --Ralph Ungermann, CEO, First Virtual Corporation
title: Personal Videoconferencing
